page.title: 18COUNCIL OF COMMUNITY SERVICE
page.content: { Malvern Hills Council of Community {Service}is a voluntary organisation providing a number of servives at local and county level. Briefly some of these services are: {Old People's Voluntary Car Service; {Community Transport Scheme; Summer {Playschemes}one for handicapped and one for all children;{a Resource {Centre}for printing etc. for use by all local voluntary groups. A{Combined Charity Fair }where local organisations show the public what they do for the community and to allow them to receive donations. Newer groups are:{Malvern Cancer {Support Group,Malvern Gingerbread and {Malvern Asthma Support Group.} The main source of income for C.C.S. comes from the sale of goods at a shop,{The Nearly New Boutique,}which is also run by volunteers. {
